title: Ahri gives you and your main this look at the pool
body:
what happens next?
http://i.imgur.com/UBfc1Gu.jpg
All comments must be kept at a rating of at most PG-13 this is non-negotiable <3~

{{champion:86}} Do you have a moment to talk about Demaci-(Gets hit in the face by a beach ball) AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH

Me:"Ooohh~" *Dreamily walks towards Ahri* 

{{champion:43}}  *Sticks her arm out in front of me* "Hold it right there, bud." 

Me:"What??"

Me:"What makes you say that?"

{{champion:43}} "Well, first of all she kind of does that all the time. Second of all you're gay af." 

Me:"Oh. Yeah."

{{champion:82}} (looks at me)
{{summoner:31}} ...what?
{{champion:82}} She's looking at you.
{{summoner:31}} She can't be looking at me, you're the one with abs looking like they were chiseled out of granite.
{{champion:82}} (watches Ahri wave at me) She saw me, looked surprised, then pointed at you, then giggled like a schoolgirl.
{{summoner:31}} ...well she did attend the prestigious Runeterra Academy... so, you're not pulling my leg?
{{champion:82}} As amusing as it would be to do so, no. (shoves me in her direction) Go ahead, champ.
{{summoner:31}} ...I'm not sure I can do this.
{{champion:82}} (grabs me and tosses me towards her, nearly colliding into her) I'm sure you'll find a way.
{{champion:103}} Are you alright?!
{{summoner:31}} My spleen...

Akali main development: [Inspiration](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Akali/Background)

**Me:** [*Nodding towards Ahri questioningly*]

{{champion:84}} [ *Pulls out rope*] **- Hesitation is the seed of defeat.**

**Me: ** [*taking out a cloth and a dipping it with a liquid*] - **Agreed.**


{{champion:84}} [_steamy voice with dreamy eyes_]  **- We travel the same path.**

**Me:** [_with a note of disapproval in my voice_] - **Remain focused.**

{{champion:84}} [_regains her cold composure_]  - **Mark acquired**

**Me: ** [*Look Akali in the eyes all serious*] - **A necessary sacrifice.**

{{champion:84}} [*Nods*]  - **Without question.**

**Me:** [ *said softly while I hand her the wet cloth*] - **Tread lightly.**

{{champion:84}}  [*Disapears from sight*] -  **Understood.**

**Me: ** [*Looking at Ahri *] - **Through twilight's veil.**

Me: _Casually reading a book_
{{champion:16}}: Hey! 
Me: What?
{{champion:16}}: Ahri's looking at you!
Me: _Looks up_ Yep, she is. _Continues reading_
{{champion:16}}: So go talk to her!
Me: You go talk to her!
{{champion:16}}: Why would I! She's looking at you!
Me: Because I'm too lazy! _Gets hit with a banana_ Ow! Ow! Fine! I'll go! You're supposed to be a healer, stop hurting me!
Me: _Stalls_ What would I even say?
{{champion:16}}: Just say hi, start a conversation.
Me: You mean I actually have to talk!?
{{champion:16}}: _Sigh_ You're unbelievable.
Me: How about I just wave back? That'll be fine right? _Waves_
{{champion:103}}: _Giggles_
Me: There, now can I go back to reading?
{{champion:16}}: _Facepalm_

{{champion:103}} *Looks heartbroken, tears well up in her eyes*
Me: N-no, no, it's okay! He's... different from other men. I'm sure he was just shy. Yeah, that's it!!!
